statements: SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_fees;
SELECT customer_name, disposal_date, waste_category FROM waste_disposal_fees WHERE disposal_amount > 100;
SELECT id, customer_name, disposal_date FROM waste_disposal_fees WHERE waste_category = 'Plastic' ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, disposal_amount FROM waste_disposal_fees WHERE billing_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_fees WHERE disposal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_fees WHERE disposal_amount > 100 ORDER BY disposal_date DESC
SELECT id, customer_name, disposal_amount FROM waste_disposal_fees WHERE waste_category = 'Plastic'
SELECT customer_name, SUM(disposal_amount) AS total_amount FROM waste_disposal_fees GROUP BY customer_name
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_fees WHERE disposal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY disposal_amount DESC
SELECT customer_name, billing_address FROM waste_disposal_fees WHERE disposal_amount > 500 AND waste_category = 'Hazardous'
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_fees
SELECT fee_amount, disposal_date FROM waste_disposal_fees WHERE fee_amount > 50 ORDER BY disposal_date DESC
SELECT fee_amount, disposal_date FROM waste_disposal_fees WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY disposal_date ASC
SELECT bill_amount, bill_date FROM billing_information WHERE bill_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY bill_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(bill_amount) AS total_amount FROM billing_information GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_fees WHERE fee_amount > 100 ORDER BY disposal_date DESC
SELECT fee_id, fee_amount, disposal_date FROM waste_disposal_fees WHERE disposal_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT customer_id, SUM(fee_amount) AS total_fees FROM waste_disposal_fees GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_fees > 500
SELECT * FROM billing_information INNER JOIN customers ON billing_information.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT MAX(bill_amount) AS highest_bill_amount FROM billing_information
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_fees;
SELECT disposal_location, disposal_fee FROM waste_disposal_fees WHERE disposal_fee > 100;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT billing_id, amount_due, payment_status FROM billing_information WHERE payment_status = FALSE;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_fees;
SELECT customer_id, disposal_fee, disposal_date FROM waste_disposal_fees WHERE disposal_fee > 100;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_accounts WHERE contact_person = 'John Smith';
SELECT billing_id, invoice_number, amount_due, payment_status FROM billing_information WHERE payment_status = FALSE ORDER BY invoice_date;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal;
SELECT id, waste_type, weight FROM waste_disposal WHERE weight > 100;
SELECT waste_type, disposal_date FROM waste_disposal ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE id = 3;
SELECT invoice_number, total_amount, payment_status FROM invoices WHERE payment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT id, waste_type, weight FROM waste_disposal WHERE disposal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY weight ASC;

SELECT customers.name, billing_information.amount FROM customers JOIN billing_information ON customers.id = billing_information.customer_id WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY billing_information.invoice_date DESC;

SELECT invoices.invoice_number, customers.name, invoices.total_amount FROM invoices JOIN customers ON invoices.customer_id = customers.id WHERE invoices.payment_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY invoices.total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE invoice_number LIKE '%INV%' AND total_amount < 1000 ORDER BY invoice_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalFees
SELECT waste_provider, fee_amount FROM WasteDisposalFees WHERE fee_amount > 100
SELECT location_name, address FROM WasteDisposalLocations ORDER BY location_name DESC
SELECT customer_name, billing_address, bill_amount FROM BillingInformation WHERE payment_status = 'Pending'
SELECT invoice_id, total_amount FROM InvoiceRecords WHERE total_amount < 500
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalFees WHERE fee_amount > 100 ORDER BY date_collected DESC
SELECT DISTINCT waste_provider, SUM(fee_amount) AS total_fee FROM WasteDisposalFees GROUP BY waste_provider HAVING total_fee > 500 ORDER BY total_fee DESC
SELECT customer_name, bill_amount, payment_status FROM BillingInformation WHERE payment_status IN ('Paid', 'Pending') ORDER BY customer_name ASC, bill_amount DESC

SELECT IR.invoice_id, IR.total_amount, PT.payment_date FROM InvoiceRecords IR JOIN PaymentTransactions PT ON IR.invoice_id = PT.invoice_id WHERE IR.total_amount >= PT.payment_amount ORDER BY PT.payment_date ASC
SELECT location_name, address, waste_type FROM WasteDisposalLocations WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' AND waste_type = 'Hazardous' ORDER BY location_name ASC
